attributes.action: Make ielts results valid for at least 10 years.
attributes.background: It s rip off for those who live in English speaking countries but still have to give ielts after every two years if they need e.g higher education / immigration etc

rejection.details:
Universities, not the UK Government or Parliament, set their own entry requirements.

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to accept IELTs results up to 10 years old as evidence for language requirements for visa applications.
